title: In-memory Engine: `iter_overlapped_regions` panics no entry found for key
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

Running a custom sysbench workload, TiKV panics with the following stacktrace.

```log
[2024/09/01 14:15:38.837 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:478] ["no entry found for key"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/lib.rs:477:18
   1: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::Fn<Args>>::call
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2029:9
      std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:783:13
   2: std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:657:13
   3: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:171:18
   4: rust_begin_unwind
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:645:5
   5: core::panicking::panic_fmt
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panicking.rs:72:14
   6: core::panicking::panic_display
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panicking.rs:196:5
      core::panicking::panic_str
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panicking.rs:171:5
      core::option::expect_failed
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/option.rs:1980:5
   7: core::option::Option<T>::expect
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/option.rs:894:21
      <std::collections::hash::map::HashMap<K,V,S> as core::ops::index::Index<&Q>>::index
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/collections/hash/map.rs:1338:23
      range_cache_memory_engine::range_manager::RegionManager::iter_overlapped_regions
             at home/stn/tikv/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/range_manager.rs:318:44
      range_cache_memory_engine::range_manager::RegionManager::check_overlap_with_region
             at home/stn/tikv/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/range_manager.rs:418:9
      range_cache_memory_engine::range_manager::RegionManager::load_region
             at home/stn/tikv/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/range_manager.rs:762:30
   8: range_cache_memory_engine::engine::RangeCacheMemoryEngine::prepare_for_apply
             at home/stn/tikv/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/engine.rs:348:16
      <range_cache_memory_engine::write_batch::RangeCacheWriteBatch as engine_traits::write_batch::WriteBatch>::prepare_for_region
             at home/stn/tikv/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/write_batch.rs:494:37
   9: <raftstore::coprocessor::read_write::write_batch::WriteBatchWrapper<WB> as engine_traits::write_batch::WriteBatch>::prepare_for_region
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/coprocessor/read_write/write_batch.rs:118:13
      raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyContext<EK>::prepare_for
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:547:9
  10: raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyDelegate<EK>::handle_raft_committed_entries
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:1134:9
  11: raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>::handle_apply
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4087:9
  12: raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>::handle_tasks
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4441:25
  13: <raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyPoller<EK> as batch_system::batch::PollHandler<raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ApplyFsm<EK>,raftstore::store::fsm::apply::ControlFsm>>::handle_normal
             at home/stn/tikv/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/apply.rs:4733:9
  14: batch_system::batch::Poller<N,C,Handler>::poll
             at home/stn/tikv/components/batch-system/src/batch.rs:422:27
  15: batch_system::batch::BatchSystem<N,C>::start_poller::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/tikv/components/batch-system/src/batch.rs:551:17
      <std::thread::Builder as tikv_util::sys::thread::StdThreadBuildWrapper>::spawn_wrapper::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/tikv/components/tikv_util/src/sys/thread.rs:438:13
      std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:155:18
  16: std::thread::Builder::spawn_unchecked_::{{closure}}::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/thread/mod.rs:529:17
      <core::panic::unwind_safe::AssertUnwindSafe<F> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/panic/unwind_safe.rs:272:9
      std::panicking::try::do_call
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:552:40
      std::panicking::try
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panicking.rs:516:19
      std::panic::catch_unwind
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/panic.rs:142:14
      std::thread::Builder::spawn_unchecked_::{{closure}}
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/thread/mod.rs:528:30
      core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/ops/function.rs:250:5
  17: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<Args>>::call_once
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2015:9
      <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<Args>>::call_once
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2015:9
      std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start
             at home/stn/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-2023-12-28-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17
  18: start_thread
  19: __clone3
"] [location=components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/range_manager.rs:318] [thread_name=apply-1] [thread_id=117]
```

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

4c1bfe1fe27e99b71b500191fe973f9db9286cb4: A testing branch that merges https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/17296 and https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/17359

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

```
sysbench --mysql-host=$HOST --mysql-user=root --mysql-port=$PORT --threads=10  --db-driver=mysql --report-interval=1 --mysql-db=jobs --time=3600000  --number_workspaces=2 --jobs_per_org=10000 --select_percentage=10 many_delete_mvcc.lua run
```

### What did you expect?

No panic

### What did happened?

See above.
